fullText: The musical 'KPOP,' which opened on Broadway on Sunday, is more of a multimedia experience than a traditional book musical, and though it has undeniable energy and spectacle, it lacks the emotional depth that might make it more than just a flashy tribute to the Korean pop phenomenon.
